summary: WHILE DRIVING UNDER RAINY CONDITIONS, CONSUMER STATED" THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY LOSS ALL POWER EVERYTHING SHUTS DOWN.  TOOK TO DEALER, AND DEALER STATED THAT THE SERPENTINE BELT FELL OFF.  CONSUMER STATES" BELT FELL OFF 5 TIMES. DEALER HAS TOLD CONSUMER NOT TO DRIVE VEHICLE IN THE RAIN.  PLEASE DESCRIBE FURTHER. TS
